Skip Image Carousel
Meetings & Corporate
Milestone Events
Tournaments & Outings
Weddings
Experience the Beauty of Hunter's Green
Whether you're a Member or not, you're welcome to host your next event with us!
Our Grand Ballroom is a stunning space that can accommodate up to 300 guests for your special event. It features floor-to-ceiling windows that offer a picturesque view of the golf course and surrounding natural beauty, as well as elegant chandeliers and a spacious dance floor. Our experienced event planning team will work with you to customize every detail, from the décor and menu to the entertainment and more, ensuring that your event is truly unforgettable.
Contact Our Event Sales Director
Celebrate the Wedding of Your Dreams
Hunter's Green is the perfect venue for couples looking to create a dream wedding that reflects their unique style and preferences.
The all-inclusive wedding packages are designed to take care of every detail, ensuring that the couple can enjoy their special day without any stress.
The customizable packages allow couples to personalize their experience, from selecting the perfect hand-crafted dinner menu to choosing the décor that suits their vision. The beautiful event spaces, stunning golf course views, and exceptional service create an unforgettable atmosphere for the wedding celebration.
At Hunter's Green, we take pride in creating magical memories that last a lifetime.
Explore Weddings
Celebrate the Wedding of Your Dreams
Hunter's Green is the perfect venue for couples looking to create a dream wedding that reflects their unique style and preferences.
The all-inclusive wedding packages are designed to take care of every detail, ensuring that the couple can enjoy their special day without any stress.
The customizable packages allow couples to personalize their experience, from selecting the perfect hand-crafted dinner menu to choosing the décor that suits their vision. The beautiful event spaces, stunning golf course views, and exceptional service create an unforgettable atmosphere for the wedding celebration.
At Hunter's Green, we take pride in creating magical memories that last a lifetime.
Explore Weddings
"My husband and I are so, very happy we used HG for our reception venue! Everything looked amazing and JUST what I had envisioned. My guests loved it!"
Eileen
Plan the Perfect Private Event
At Hunter's Green, we understand the importance of creating the perfect atmosphere for your private event. Whether you are planning a corporate retreat, a family reunion, or a birthday party, our dedicated private events team will work with you to bring your vision to life. With a variety of event spaces to choose from, including our stunning Grand Ballroom and picturesque outdoor terrace, we can accommodate events of all sizes and styles.
Our team will attend to every detail, from selecting the perfect menu to arranging the ideal lighting and decor, ensuring that your event is a memorable success. Let us pamper you with stress-free planning and attentive coordination, so you can sit back, relax, and enjoy your special occasion.
Start Planning Your Event
Plan the Perfect Private Event
At Hunter's Green, we understand the importance of creating the perfect atmosphere for your private event. Whether you are planning a corporate retreat, a family reunion, or a birthday party, our dedicated private events team will work with you to bring your vision to life. With a variety of event spaces to choose from, including our stunning Grand Ballroom and picturesque outdoor terrace, we can accommodate events of all sizes and styles.
Our team will attend to every detail, from selecting the perfect menu to arranging the ideal lighting and decor, ensuring that your event is a memorable success. Let us pamper you with stress-free planning and attentive coordination, so you can sit back, relax, and enjoy your special occasion.
Start Planning Your Event
"I highly recommend this venue. The food was good, the space is lovely, the outdoor scenery was perfect for photos...the staff was friendly. Just perfect."
Stacey
Combine Business with Pleasure
Discover new ways to inspire your team and impress your colleagues when you host your next corporate meeting or event at Hunter’s Green Country Club. We provide customized menus, personalized service and professional accommodations for a variety of business functions, including formal meetings, client-relation dinners, team-building sessions, corporate golf outings, employee play days and more.
Schedule A Meeting
Zoe Cross
Event Sales Director
Contact Me
813-761-1388
Contact Me
About Zoe

Zoe Cross information modal
Zoe Cross
Event Sales Director
Serving since 2023
813-761-1388
Zoe.Cross
813-761-1388
Zoe.Cross
Contact Me
About Zoe
Zoe Cross is our new Private Events Coordinator for Hunter’s Green Country Club. She just moved to the area at the beginning of August and loves it here so far! Zoe was born and raised in Miami, FL but has been living in Washington D.C. for the past two years for grad school. Zoe has been involved in the events industry since she was 15 years old, and is excited to be continuing that here at Hunter’s Green! She has a 3-year-old French bulldog named River and in her free time loves doing yoga, traveling, and spending time with her friends and family.
Contact Me

Host An Event
Meetings & Corporate
Tournaments & Outings
Weddings
The Perfect Tampa Event Destination!
Nestled within a wildlife conservatory, Hunter’s Green Country Club delights in picturesque views of our championship golf course. Ordained by natural light throughout our Grand Ballroom, the club encompasses a feeling of airy and light-hearted appeal that will enhance any gathering. Providing both casual and formal spaces, the club accommodates professionals with the latest technology, personalized gourmet menus and the added option of a customized golf outing. The club is also a favorite among brides-to-be with a private event staff lead by a professional and highly experienced Private Events Director of who can help you plan the perfect day from start to finish.
Whether your event is casual or formal, intimate or immense, the club’s private event staff provides expert guidance for an impressive, memorable, meticulously orchestrated event. We look forward to working with you on planning the event of a lifetime.
Our expertise covers a wide range of private event needs to include:
Wedding Ceremonies & Receptions
Showers (Baby & Bridal)
Anniversary Parties
Birthday Parties
Private Dinners
Banquets
School Parties
Holiday Parties
Reunions
Luncheons
Bar/Bat Mitzvah
Rehearsal Dinners
Seminars
Business Meetings
Start Planning Your Event

Contact Me
About Zoe
Zoe Cross is our new Private Events Coordinator for Hunter’s Green Country Club. She just moved to the area at the beginning of August and loves it here so far! Zoe was born and raised in Miami, FL but has been living in Washington D.C. for the past two years for grad school. Zoe has been involved in the events industry since she was 15 years old, and is excited to be continuing that here at Hunter’s Green! She has a 3-year-old French bulldog named River and in her free time loves doing yoga, traveling, and spending time with her friends and family.
Contact Me

Skip Image Carousel
Membership
Hunter's Green offers various membership options to suit the needs of individuals and families.
As a member of Hunter's Green, you will have access to all of the Club's facilities, including the Tom Fazio championship golf course, 17 Har-Tru tennis courts, fitness center, resort-style pool facilities, and multiple dining venues.
The Club's social calendar is always packed with exciting events and activities for members of all ages, allowing you to make lasting connections with other members and build a sense of community.
Additionally, the Club offers various programs and services to enhance your experience, such as golf and tennis lessons, fitness classes, and junior programs.
The membership team is always available to answer any questions and help you find the perfect membership package to suit your needs and lifestyle.
Schedule A Tour
Opens in new tab
View Our Membership Brochure
Membership Categories
Golf
Full access for Member, spouse and dependent children under age 23 to all golf and practice facilities, tennis, fitness, swimming, and dining and social facilities at the Club. Members enjoy 7-day advance tee times, access to USGA handicap system, and opportunity to compete in men's and ladies' golf tournaments hosted by the Club. Includes XLife benefits in Tampa Bay and nationwide.
Contact Us To Find Out More
Tennis
Full access for Member, spouse and dependent children under age 23 to all tennis, fitness, swimming, and dining and social facilities at the Club. Members enjoy tennis leagues, lessons and clinics. Includes XLife benefits in Tampa Bay and nationwide.
Contact Us To Find Out More
Social
Full access for Member, spouse and dependent children under age 23 to all fitness, swimming, and dining and social facilities at the Club. Includes XLife benefits in Tampa Bay and nationwide.
Contact Us To Find Out More
City Club Access - Your membership includes access to dining, events, and networking at 20 city clubs, both locally and nationwide. Check out your local area clubs to explore exclusive experiences near you.
City Clubs Collection
Tower Club - Ft Lauderdale, FL
Centre Club - Tampa, FL
Citrus Club - Orlando, FL
Wherever you go, your membership goes, too.
While our Club is exclusively open to Members and their guests, our Members have special access and opportunities at many other top-tier country clubs and golf courses in the Tampa area and nationwide through our relationship to the Invited network. Wherever you go, your membership goes with you.
Cross Bay & Cross Bay Premier Benefits
If you're looking to enhance your membership with some exciting local club perks, this offers incredible value. With the Cross Bay benefits, you'll have the opportunity to relish golf access at discounted cart fees and enjoy reduced guest fees at not just two extra country clubs (Cross Bay) but THREE extra clubs (Cross Bay Premier) within the Tampa Bay region. Furthermore, you'll receive a 25% discount on food and beverage purchases at the additional clubs as well as your home club. Additionally, you can take advantage of special pricing for booking private events.
Get In Touch
Reach out to our Membership Director today.
Schedule A Tour
Hold on, there's more...
• Love teeing off during your travels?
• Enjoy discounts when you dine?
Get all of this and more with XLife.
Click to Discover XLife
Did You Know?
The Invited network extends across the Tampa area and Members with XLife enhanced benefits have access based on their membership category.
